Element.Name: LINE TAX INFORMATION
Element.Description: (Aligned) — A group of business terms providing information about the TAX applicable for the goods and services invoiced on the Invoice line.

Element.Name: Invoiced item TAX category code
Element.Description: (Aligned) — The TAX category code for the invoiced item.

Element.Name: Invoiced item TAX rate
Element.Description: (Aligned) — The TAX rate, represented as percentage that applies to the invoiced item.

Element.Name: Unit TAX
Element.Description: (Aligned) — The TAX rate, represented as percentage that applies to the invoiced item.

Element.Name: TAX exemption reason code
Element.Description: (Aligned) — A coded statement of the reason for why the amount is exempted from TAX.

Element.Name: TAX exemption reason text
Element.Description: (Aligned) — A textual statement of the reason why the amount is exempted from TAX or why no TAX is being charged.
